SEARCH
Package model

Class RefillRequest

java.lang.Object
model.RefillRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Request
public class RefillRequest extends Object implements Request
Represents a refill request for a specific medication. Tracks details such as the medication name, requested amount, request date and time, and the associated pharmacist and administrator. Provides methods to approve or decline the request.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Kuan Rong Shane, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen

  • Constructor Details

    • RefillRequest

      public RefillRequest(String medication, int requestedAmount, Pharmacist p, Administrator a)
      Constructs a RefillRequest with the specified details. The request status is initialized to PENDING, and the request date and time are set to the current date and time.
      Parameters:
      medication - The name of the medication being requested.
      requestedAmount - The amount of medication requested.
      p - The Pharmacist handling the request.
      a - The Administrator overseeing the request.

  • Method Details

    • getMedication

      public String getMedication()
      Retrieves the name of the medication being requested.
      Returns:
      The medication name.

    • getAdmin

      public Administrator getAdmin()
      Retrieves the administrator associated with the request.
      Returns:

      public int getRequestedAmount()
      Retrieves the amount of medication requested.

      The LocalTime of the request.

    • acceptRequest

      public void acceptRequest()
      Approves the refill request by setting its status to APPROVED. Prints a confirmation message to the console.
      Specified by:
      acceptRequest in interface Request

    • declineRequest

      public void declineRequest()
      Declines the refill request by setting its status to DECLINED. Prints a confirmation message to the console.
      Specified by:
      declineRequest in interface Request

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the refill request. Includes the request ID, medication name, requested amount, status, and the date and time of the request.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the request.
